when we make
investments in technology today many of
us view that as it's got to have a life
cycle of 3 to 5
years as our cycle times and Agility
change the business climate
changes the technology that we deploy or
the workloads that we deploy may only be
temporary so we will view technology as
being disposable and solutions that we
deploy as having shorter life cycles
it's of no surprise to anybody what
we're experiencing today is the
demand from our companies to acquire
data from any and every Source possible
and to retain that data for longer
periods of time so that we can analyze
that data not necessarily knowing what
that question is going to be tomorrow I
want to challenge you to talk to your
teams to identify the high value low
effort
projects that are aligned with
delivering business value for your
organization and to go one step further
to identify a timeline by which you can
either initiate or Advance your adoption
of the cloud
